title: Can anyone recomend a typeface for an Architecture project
content:
Hello Typos.  
We have a project on to design a website / publication for  
a school of architecture.  
BUT I’m quite stuck trying to come up with a nice  
modern sans.  
DIN’s too dry and Helvetica yawn...  
But Univers is near but not quite.

Any ideas  
neo/modernism is the key word here

thanks

Mr Brown

[http://www.aaschool.info/publications/cat.asp?categ=new](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821133416/http:/www.aaschool.info/publications/cat.asp?categ=new "http://www.aaschool.info/publications/cat.asp?categ=new")

 [‹ Font for legal contract?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821133416/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36321 "Go to previous forum topic") [Letterpress Typeface ? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821133416/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36356 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Mr Brown

comments.content:
I think Plexes Pro by Dino dos Santos would work  
 [http://dstype.com/main.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821133416/http:/dstype.com/main.htm "http://dstype.com/main.htm")

or maybe Relato Sans by emtype  
 [http://www.emtype.net/relatosans\_1.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821133416/http:/www.emtype.net/relatosans_1.html "http://www.emtype.net/relatosans\_1.html")

Neo Sans  
Cachet  
Ocean Sans (now Pro)  
Leitura Sans  
Cholla  
Etelka  
Camingo  
Stainless  
Rogue Sans  
Quagmire  
Amor  
Vida
